answers.answer: Were you fasting before you went in? I got my test done and my results read 131. They explained to me abnormal or positive for gestational diabetes was 140 or above.

Yes I was.. The thing is is have my appointment at 3:00 pm so is didn't eat all the day and I did drink a lot of water. And they told me that maybe it had been that I ate something the night before and I ate chocolate and cookies the night before. .. maybe it was that.

question: So I had my glucose test done. My results Came back to 137 and my doctor said I failed. I went back yesterday to do the 3 hr one and I am soooo nervous. I get my results tomorrow.  Did you all pass the glucose test?
title: glucose levels
